title: The Seven People in the Waiting Room

infobox.Title:: The Seven People in the Waiting Room
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ran Mouri  Kogoro Mouri
infobox.Animation director:: Masatomo Sudo and Seiji Muta (supervisors)  Keiko Sasaki
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Nobuyuki Iwai  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Ako Mayama as Fune Shimao  Mitsuki Saiga as Noriko Kurusu  Yuka Iguchi as Masako Ueno  Minoru Inaba as Hitoshi Takegami  Atsushi Kisaichi as Yuichi Hokari  Takanori Hoshino as Carl Morris  Takashi Taguchi as Shonosuke Yuhara  Ryō Kamon as Kikuo Inagaki
infobox.Opening song:: Sekai wa Anata no Iro ni Naru

sections.Situation:
Returning from a mountain hike, Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are blocked by a heavy thunderstorm in the waiting room of Ofumoto train station, in a campaign of Tochigi Prefecture, with other people. All trains arriving and departing for Tokyo were suspended until the end of the storm.
After being with Conan at the spa of the station, Kogoro finds in his jacket pocket a ticket containing a request for help and the prediction of a murder. A few hours later, Noriko Kurusu, an assemblyman's secretary, suddenly decides to leave the building and is killed. Masako Ueno, the station employee, is also stunned.

sections.Resolution:
In the morning, after the kidnapping, the real stationmaster was found tied up in a closet by Kogoro.

- Victim (kidnapped)
- Real Ofumoto Station stationmaster
sections.Trivia: - Just like in Library Murder Case, Conan's weight is 18.4 kg (39 lbs).
